name: KSL Hotel & Resort
detail: There was a mistake in my booking & I realized only during check-in. However thanks to Agoda & KSL, I managed to resolve the problem & the staff who attended to me (tall Malay girl) was very patient & helpful. Overall, I enjoyed my stay in this hotel. Shopping is just downstairs. Breakfast was good with many variety on offer & helpful staff. Guests can rest at the lounge while waiting for check-in (brilliant idea - wish more hotels can do this!) Only grouse was the parking. I checked in on a Sunday & the mall parking was full so had to drive up to the higher levels. Small thing & did not in anyway affect my stay here. I highly recommend KSL Resort to anyone wanting a good hotel in Johor Bahru.
area: Johor Bahru City Center,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Fraser Place Puteri Harbour
detail: If you are in Johor Bahru just to visit Legoland and do a bit of shopping at JPO, this hotel would be the beat choice. This is one of the newer hotels in the area and the rooms are the best! Downside is that the restaurants are quite far and the only food option is to done in the hotel restaurant which serves good food anyway.
area: Gelang Patah/Legoland,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Capri by Fraser Johor Bahru
detail: Capri by Fraser Johor Bahru is a new hotel and is very close to city centre. We got the studio deluxe king room in 32nd floor facing the beautiful city and the sea. We loved the place very much its so clean, peaceful and beautiful. We came here just for 1 night but ended up extending the room for further 2 nights. Whatever i review about this hotel is not enough, you will have to come and stay here to feel it. You will not find any other hotels in this price in Johor who can provide you premium quality stuffs in the room, right from the comfy bed,pillows to new premium linens, towels and other amenities.You will not regret for you stay here, so book now to come and experience it, We have decided to stay here only whenever we come to Johor. Thanks very much to all the Capri's crew, for all your efforts and hard work you have put into this hotel to keep it in top notch. Hope you all continue the same, so guests like us can come back often to have a pleasant stay and a wonderful time.
area: Johor Bahru City Center,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Fives Hotel Johor Bahru City Centre
detail: This is by far the best 3 star hotel that I had stay in JB.
area: Johor Bahru City Center,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Holiday Villa Johor Bahru City Centre
detail: Simply one of the best I've experienced around the world, and definitely the best, the number 1 choice if you are looking to stay in Johor Bahru. Excellent location, just beside KSL shopping, of course you have ksl resort as an option which is located above the shopping mall, but the staff service is nothing compared to the ones at Holiday villa. The cleanliness, the room, the comfy bed, the infinity pool (as raved by many), and above all, the staff service was simply awesome. You can never find a hotel better than this in Johor Bahru, if not the whole of Malaysia, and beats alot of hotel hands down world wide. At an affordable rate of average $85 per night, you can have all the best sleep of your night. 5 star rating and recommend to all to stay here.
area: Johor Bahru City Center,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Opero Hotel Southkey Johor Bahru
detail: All staff are professional and easy to communicate with.

name: Tune Hotel - Danga Bay Johor
detail: tune hotel danga bay is the best option for stay when come to johor. located near to danga bay which is one of the attraction in johor bahru. one of the great feature of this hotel is the energy saving concept. i would recommend others to stay at this hotel when come to johor bahru.
area: Danga Bay,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Somerset Medini Iskandar Puteri
detail: I was going to Legoland Malaysia with my wife and my son and we stayed at Somerset Medini for 3D2N. The hotel was really excellent and all the staff very helpful. 1. The location is just 5 mins walking distance to Legoland ( Theme Park and Water Park ) and Medini Mall 2. Somerset Medini provides shuttle car from hotel to Hello Kitty Town & Thomas & Friend location. 3. From City Square Mall / Johor Bahru Customs is just about 20 mins to reach the hotel ( SOMERSET ). 4. All the staff ( Receptionist, Security, etc ) are very helpful indeed. 5. The room is big ( because I stay with my family ) and very clean. I would like to suggest my friends too
area: Gelang Patah/Legoland,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Le Grandeur Palm Resort Johor
detail: the stay was enjoyable, the breakfast spread was more than decent although a little bit of class in the item such as single serving desserts will be welcome. the pool was decent and most importantly very clean, although more furniture for the swimming pool would be nice. what is not so nice is that there are not enough things going on surrounding the hotel, with Johor Bahru city still about 30 mins away.
area: Senai / Airport,Johor Bahru - View on map

name: Amari Johor Bahru
detail: Stayed at Amari for one night with my partner and I must say the hotel's location is fantastic and ideal for a short trip across the Causeway. It is just a short walk from the Johor Bahru checkpoint and across the road from two popular shopping malls â€” City Square and Komtar JBCC. In terms of customer service, we had a pleasant check-in experience and received a free upgrade to a junior suite (we had originally booked an executive club king room). The room was spacious, comfortable and clean, nothing to complain about at all. The pillow menu we found at our bedside table was a nice welcome touch as well although we did not utilise it. Breakfast buffet selection was also quite varied and we enjoyed it very much. We did not manage to try the rest of the dining options at Amari given our short stay. While Amari's rates are certainly more expensive than the average hotel in Johor Bahru, I'd say it's worth the splurge especially if you're looking for a nice place for a quick getaway.
area: Johor Bahru City Center,Johor Bahru - View on map
